Gosh

comment.author: 53769726@N04
comment._content: Anyone read the "Imperial Cruise" by James Bradley? In it we find out that Alice's father Teddy sold the Koreans down the river in support of the Japanese. Also Americans at the time felt it was their God given right to direct the rest of the world on how to live, a lot like today and the Mid East. I guess some things just never change.

comment._content: The back story to this (including contemporary accounts of her "rudeness") can be found here: www.monster-island.net/2009/11/century-of-foreign-guests-...
